csl:
<style xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl"
    class="in-text"
    xml:lang="en"
    version="1.0">
  <info>
    <id></id>
    <title></title>
    <updated>2009-08-10T04:49:00+09:00</updated>
  </info>

  <citation>
    <layout prefix="(" suffix=")">
      <group delimiter=" ">
        <names variable="author" font-style="italic" suffix="!">
          <name/>
        </names>
        <date variable="issued">
          <date-part name="year"/>
        </date>
      </group>
    </layout>
  </citation>
</style>
